nodes.text: RT-56/X was a silver protocol droid with a masculine personality. He was equipped with a limited function vocabulator capable of speaking over 800,000 languages, and a SureDeal-R bargaining and negotiation logic initiator. RT-56/X was the partner of the farmer Biull Sangtwo, where the two would sell the droid to unsuspecting offworlders for a small fee that they would hope to capitalize on by reselling the droid. After the deal was complete, RT-56/X would slip away and return to Sangtwo.
